warmUp.name: Leg Swings

exercises.name: Bodyweight Squats
exercises.description: Focus on controlled descent and explosive rise

exercises.name: Push-Ups
exercises.description: Adjust to knees if needed

exercises.name: Reverse Lunges
exercises.description: Alternating legs

exercises.name: Plank with Shoulder Taps
exercises.description: Maintain a strong plank position, tap each shoulder alternating hands

exercises.name: Mountain Climbers
exercises.description: Maintain a fast, controlled pace

coolDown.name: Hip Flexor Stretch
coolDown.description: 30 seconds per side, kneeling lunge position

warmUp.name: Torso Twists
warmUp.description: Standing, rotate upper body side to side

warmUp.name: Knee Hugs
warmUp.description: Alternate bringing each knee to chest while standing

warmUp.name: Lateral Leg Swings
warmUp.description: 30 seconds per leg, side to side

warmUp.name: Butt Kicks
warmUp.description: Jog in place, bringing heels to glutes

exercises.name: Jump Squats
exercises.description: Squat down and explode into a jump

exercises.name: Diamond Push-Ups
exercises.description: Hands close together under chest

exercises.name: Curtsy Lunges
exercises.description: Cross one leg behind the other as you lunge

exercises.name: Side Plank with Reach-Through
exercises.description: Alternate sides each round

exercises.name: High Knees
exercises.description: Run in place, bringing knees up to waist level

exercises.name: Flutter Kicks
exercises.description: Lie on your back, legs straight, and alternate kicking

coolDown.name: Standing Quad Stretch
coolDown.description: 30 seconds per leg, pull ankle toward glute

coolDown.name: Seated Forward Fold
coolDown.description: Sit on the floor, legs straight, and reach for toes

warmUp.name: Arm Swings
warmUp.description: Swing arms forward and backward, alternating

warmUp.name: Leg Cradles
warmUp.description: Pull one leg up and across the body, alternating sides

warmUp.name: Hip Flexor Stretch
warmUp.description: 30 seconds per side, lunge position with a reach up

exercises.name: Squat to Calf Raise
exercises.description: Squat down, then rise up onto toes

exercises.name: Wide Push-Ups
exercises.description: Hands wider than shoulder-width

exercises.name: Step-Back Lunges
exercises.description: Step back into a lunge, alternating legs

exercises.name: Plank to Side Plank
exercises.description: Start in a plank, rotate to a side plank, alternating sides

exercises.name: Skater Jumps
exercises.description: Leap from side to side, landing softly

exercises.name: Leg Raises
exercises.description: Lie on your back, raise legs to 90 degrees and lower slowly

coolDown.name: Figure-Four Stretch
coolDown.description: 30 seconds per side, cross ankle over opposite knee and lean forward

coolDown.name: Cat-Cow Stretch
coolDown.description: On all fours, alternate arching and rounding the back

warmUp.name: World’s Greatest Stretch
warmUp.description: 1 minute per side, deep lunge with a twist

warmUp.name: High Knees
warmUp.description: Focus on driving the knees up

exercises.name: 15 Burpees
exercises.description: After 15 reps, rest for remaining time.

exercises.name: 20 Air Squats
exercises.description: Then rest for remaining time.

exercises.name: 15 Push-Ups
exercises.description: Then rest for remaining time.

exercises.name: 20 Mountain Climbers
exercises.description: (each leg counts as one) Then rest.

exercises.name: 20 Reverse Lunges
exercises.description: (each leg counts as one) Then rest.

exercises.name: 15 Plank to Push-Up
exercises.description: Then rest for remaining time.

exercises.name: 20 Jump Squats
exercises.description: Then rest for remaining time.

exercises.name: 15 Bicycle Crunches
exercises.description: (each side counts as one) Then rest.

exercises.name: 20 Lateral Plank Walks
exercises.description: (10 steps in each direction) Then rest.

exercises.name: 15 Skater Jumps
exercises.description: (each side counts as one) Then rest.

exercises.name: 20 Leg Raises
exercises.description: Then rest for remaining time.

exercises.name: 15 Plank with Shoulder Taps
exercises.description: (each side counts as one) Then rest.

exercises.name: 20 High Knees
exercises.description: (each knee counts as one) Then rest.

exercises.name: 15 Jumping Lunges
exercises.description: (each leg counts as one) Then rest.

coolDown.name: Child’s Pose
coolDown.description: Kneel on the floor, sit back on heels, and stretch arms forward

coolDown.name: Seated Hamstring Stretch
coolDown.description: 30 seconds per leg, reach towards toes
